          <title>
            <string language="en">Reaction of copper carbonate with dilute sulphuric acid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reaktion des kupfernen Karbonats mit verdünnter 
Schwefelsäure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction du carbonate de cuivre avec de l'acide 
sulfurique dilué</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do carbonato de cobre com ácido 
sulfúrico diluído</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione di carbonato di rame con acido solforico
diluito</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση του ανθρακικού άλατος χαλκού με το αραιό 
θειικό οξύ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del carbonato de cobre con el ácido 
sulfúrico diluído</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the resulting mixture when copper carbonate is added to dilute sulphuric acid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper carbonate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dilute</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mixture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphuric acid</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die resultierende Mischung,
wenn kupfernes Karbonat hinzugefügt wird, um Schwefelsäure zu 
verdünnen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre le mélange résultant 
quand le carbonate de cuivre est ajouté pour diluer l'acide 
sulfurique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a mistura resultante 
quando o carbonato de cobre é adicionado para diluir o ácido 
sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la miscela risultante
quando il carbonato di rame è aggiunto per diluire l'acido solforico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει προκύπτον μίγμα πότε το 
ανθρακικό άλας χαλκού προστίθεται στο αραιό θειικό οξύ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la mezcla que resulta 
cuando el carbonato de cobre se agrega para diluir el ácido 
sulfúrico.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">kupfernes Karbonat</string>
